short_description: heftig cidre is a wine shop/winery based in bern, switzerland.
long_description: wir machen cidre und fruchtweine aus 100% früchten, vergoren mit ihren natürlichen hefen und ohne zusatzstoffe. we make cider and fruit wines from 100% pure fruit, fermented with its natural yeasts and without additives. we press a cider that can only be produced here from local varieties that we source from farmers in and around bern.
business_tags: fruit wine | making cider | internet service providers
generated_description: heftig cidre, legally known as chef chef gmbh, is a company based in bern, switzerland, specializing in the production of cider and fruit wines. the company sources its fruits from local farmers in and around bern, using only pure fruit without additives. the ciders are fermented naturally with the yeasts present in the fruit and are bottled as single varieties or blended into cuvées.
